title: Dreadknight Garen for twitter follow problem
body:
Hello
I have followed the official LoL twitter to get Garen and the Dreadknight Skin, and I have recieved the code, however I am unable to redeem it. While redeeming lol client says there was problem fulfilling my store items, please try again. Happens on every pc i try. Can someone help me?

Thanks in advance!

replies.body: Sorry the code's been giving you trouble.  I've checked this out for you and added the juggernaut to your account!  :D
hi . i have the same problem can u help ?
Tristana skin is not working too since it says it will be back shortly but seeing other posts on forum- many months passed and still nothing changed. Can be code redeemed?
